sentences.en: He scrambled sideways down the scree slope.
sentences.cn: 他沿着碎石坡的一侧爬了下来。

sentences.en: Occasionally scree fell in a shower of dust and noise.
sentences.cn: 偶尔会有碎石滚下，扬起大团尘土，噼啪作响。

sentences.en: Scree and grit was under my feet, and made some sounds.
sentences.cn: 卵石和砂砾在我脚下咯咯作响.

sentences.en: The product include : the pad printing, silk - scree machine, stamping machine and the whole related peripheral.
sentences.cn: 公司拥有完善的生产设备, 具有多年制造及创新经验,技术力量雄厚.

words.tran_cn: 小石子；[地质]岩屑堆；崩落；筛

trans.tran_en: an area of loose soil and broken rocks on the side of a mountain
